==Useful Info==
'''Ice devils''' are [[cold]]-themed [[tier-4 demon]]s. For a low-level character, they are a tough melee opponent (16 + 7-23 cold damage). They can be found in [[the Abyss]], [[Pandemonium]], in and around [[Ice cave]]s, or created by [[Summon Demon]].

==Tips & Tricks==
*When guarding the entrance to an Ice cave, or spawned by Summon Demon, they can appear dangerously early. While other monsters around mid-Dungeon can hit harder, ice devils have fairly good defenses, which makes it tough to win a melee fight.
*Having cold resistance will take much of the sting out of their melee attacks.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.18]], ice devils were [[tier-3 demon]]s and were stronger.
*Ice devils were once considered [[tier-2 demon]]s.
